Silence overtook the vicinity onc=
e more. Darkness and silence. Not that it was a bad thing... but it wasn't =
a good thing either. 
The spark pulsed from time to time, feeding off the e=
nergy that was offered to it, recovering. 
It had recovered enough strength=
 for the time being. Some sparks recalled past memories. It took some time,=
 but this particular spark was able to recall much. The last moments it was=
 functioning or alive was as some predacon to assasinate someone. And a nam=
e, a face, a sensation seemed to reverberate causing the spark to pulse.

N=
earby the spark, a chassis was being constructed. A large one. One nearly t=
he height of the original Megatron. As drone parts worked furiously upon th=
e chassis, the spark pulsed moreso. The containment that held it, nurtured =
it, opened and out floated the spark. 

Like a ghost, it wandered about bef=
ore leaving the facility. For the time being, the spark had forgotten about=
